code: import{fromJS}from'immutable';import*as constants from'./constants';var defaultState=fromJS({title:'',content:''});var changeDetail=function changeDetail(state,action){return state.merge({title:action.title,content:action.content});};export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case constants.CHANGE_DETAIL:return changeDetail(state,action);default:return state;}});
